entries.description: Add support for AppRunner. Create/delete/pause/resume/deploy and view logs for your AppRunner services.
Add support for building and pushing local images to ECR
Add support for running/debugging Typescript Lambdas
Fix Rider locking up when right clicking a Lambda in the AWS Explorer with a dotnet runtime in 2021.1
While debugging a Lambda function locally, make sure stopping the debugger will always stop the underlying SAM cli process (#2564)
